name: Derelict
description: Derelict is a text-adventure in which the player's space ship is caught in a tractor beam and placed inside a space station. It's up to the player to find the required items to be able to escape again. Like with other text-adventures the player can move around through different areas, examine, take and use various items. There are also hazards that can kill the player.
alsoFor: Commodore PET/CBM, TRS-80, VIC-20 | Combined View

shot.caption: For the nylon spacesuit with fitting boots it understands nylon but not suit?
The parser can be a real annoyance
Close Iron was the correct phrase eventually
And then I died because I can't breath helium. I put on my space suit but forgot to connect the oxygen tank...
